website_summaries.verdict: This night-light is for those who care about wellness, adding a salt-lamp element to an old favorite.
pros: Utilizes Himalayan salt crystals tucked inside a lamp design, purifying the environment through the power of negative ions emitted into the air
Designed to work in any outlet as its rotating base maximizes convenience
Inexpensive despite being in such a unique package
cons: Included 7W light bulb will eventually need to be replaced after continued use

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously dangerous 🤨
customer_reviews.text: Of course these hygroscopic rocks begin to sweat into the bulb.. My toddler turns on his night light & nearly sparks a fire, thank goodness I was near. These should not be on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 2 months then didn't work. Changed the bulb and tried a different outlet but it still didn't work. Ecpected it to last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I wish the mixture of salt chunks were a little more varied in color instead of mostly white. Fortunately, no one is going to notice something like that. They look great and create a warm atmosphere in my living room. I also have the large lantern that matches these wall plugs, up on a ledge.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: Love this night light!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these night lights. I previously bought on at a well known department store and paid several dollars more for it. I loved it so much that I wanted another one and I am so glad that I looked on Amazon. It's the very same night light. I got one for myself and bought some for gifts. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: B L Dilla

customer_reviews.title: Great light for use at night!
customer_reviews.text: I love these night lights! I kept one and gave one as a gift. the recipient also loves it! They are really great for lighting up a bathroom at night without having to turn on the over head lights. Will definitely purchase more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bauer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL!!!!! Honestly, I was a little hesitant at first on purchasing this night light. I thought it would be to big in the kitchen. I'm so happy I bought this! It's PERFECT size! It has the right amount of light! Perfect for when you or your family has to get a drink in the middle of the night or when one of your teenagers are getting home late. Most of all, It's so elegant with the light beaming through the rocks! I love this so much, I'm purchasing another one :)
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Schipper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: When I bought it, it worked for about a week. Had it on during the evening. Then it stopped all together. Did have a fuse blow out in the hallway of my home. Was shocked after that happening when reading a review by another buyer of this light. They claimed the same thing happened to them and blamed it on the light. Do feel it's not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Namaste

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Each time I unplug it from the wall outlet it requires putting in a new light bulb. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty! Rock dust can get everywhere upon assembly, so be careful. Seems to be helping everyone in my house with sleeping, I don't know yet about everything else it claims to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jamers8x2

customer_reviews.title: Himalayan Glow 1804 Natural Salt lamp, Framed Night light, Wall Plug in, 360 Rotatable by WBM
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend the Himalayan Glow 1804 Natural Salt lamp, Framed Night light, Wall Plug in, 360 Rotatable by WBM. I use this night light every evening. Plus, it is very decorative. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Perfetti

customer_reviews.title: It was great originally
customer_reviews.text: I loved this night light when I first got it. I wrote a glowing review, no pun intended. Unfortunately after about six weeks of use, it doesn’t work properly. I have to jiggle it to get it to come on, and it’s a crapshoot whether it stays on. I’m worried it’s a fire hazard so I’m no longer using it. I am so disappointed. I really really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: I like what I like gal

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have very high expectations for this night light, but I really love it! It is sturdy and glows just the right amount of light in my bathroom that I can see in the dark in the middle of the night. I turn it on after my shower and leave it on till morning. It is very calming. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: iteachmom

customer_reviews.title: WHY ARE MY ROCKS PALE PINK
customer_reviews.text: The description shows orange rocks, not pale pink. It doesn't have the same 'soothing' feel when it's plugged in. Its way to bright. And it's short than pictured. It doesn't match my other salt lamps in my decor.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft glow
customer_reviews.text: This was more of a solver bronze if that makes sense. My bathroom is accented with bronze and with it on. You can’t tell the color difference. Glad I got it for my bathroom. It’s a soothing color and bright enough with a wax melt wall plug in that you don’t need a light at night. Perfect for a nice relaxing bath. Would be nice for hallways and smaller spaces where you want a soft glow or the properties of the salt lamp but don’t have a place to put a larger plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Bluecowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: My only beef with these salt nightlights, as I have a few, is the bulbs wear out quick. I would keep plenty of extra bulbs on hand especially if you use it daily. I think both mine burnt out in about 2 months and I didn't use them much more than a standard light in the house would be used.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one, I love them. It's like a candle is lit all day but the salt is cleaning air at the same time. No brainer! Add a package of 7 watt bulbs because after about a year, they are hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: Base stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Nov 2018 and was really happy with my purchase. This weekend the unit base stopped working. I checked electrical sockets, bought a new bulb and still it doesn't work. Now I'm left with the basket, rocks and base and it's not functional. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B. Grable

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this. We leave it on as a night light in the laundry, where I believe it is also helping to freshen the air. The heat of being surrounded by the salt rocks caused the original incandescent bulb to have a short life. I replaced it with an LED night light bulb, which burns much cooler, and it is lasting very well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: a GLOWING REPORT
customer_reviews.text: I love Himalayan Salt Lamps. This lamp is very nice looking. is great is any room. I bought several for gifts....they were so excited to get them. I have used Himalayan Salt Lamps for years, then saw these "wall plug-ins".....very satisfied. fast delivery, wrapped securely
customer_reviews.author: Mo'

customer_reviews.title: Light won't stay on and it cut me.
customer_reviews.text: Returning. Light wouldnt stay on so i went to check the bulb. The bulb wasnt the problem. On top of that, i didnt realize that the inside was covered in razor sharp pieces from being poorly made so i sliced my finger on it.
customer_reviews.author: heather carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice little light
customer_reviews.text: You need to set the salt pieces in the holder to your liking. The bulb that came with it burned out so I am now using a 3 watt night light bulb and I like it better. Much dimmer for my bathroom area.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Cat

customer_reviews.title: Good night light
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the spot I wanted it for in my hallway. It looks good and gives off more than enough light to prevent me from tripping over my cat during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp, Warm glow, Very giftable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. They add a lovely, warm glow to any room and work great as a night light. If you want more brightness in your room, you will need to implement multiple salt rock lamps throughout the room depending on its size (this little nightlight definitely won’t illuminate a room on its own. I find the little metal cage gives it a classier look than other salt rock nightlights on the market; this would make a great gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bryse

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my bedroom. After reading a review that claimed it caught fire, I don't leave it turned on when unattended. I didn't get many darker stones either but it's still rather pretty. Definitely different from the run of the mill. Seems solid.
customer_reviews.author: MIGS

customer_reviews.title: Nice night light
customer_reviews.text: Nice night light; a little bigger than I expected. About 1/3 of my salt rocks were white as opposed to pink, but with careful placement it had a nice glow.
customer_reviews.author: DB Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are well constructed and have a homey feel and look. They give off a wonderful calming peaceful glow/color. However the lightbulbs only last about three months of continued use. My only real issue is there wasn’t quite enough salt rocks to fill it up to the top like the pictures show. I have ordered three of these and it’s is the same issue with all of them just not quite enough salt rocks. Overall I still recommend. They are our permanent night lights and all of our bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love these nightlights
customer_reviews.text: I have one in every room. The glow is soft and it improves the quality of the air at the same time. I use them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley D.

customer_reviews.title: Very calming
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for bedroom/bathroom, gives a good zen to your ambience. I wouldn't use it for light, as it only really gives off a glow to illuminate roughly the area of the room it's in.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Stuck

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZZARD
customer_reviews.text: FIRE HAZZARD-lucky our house did not burn down-wish I could get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: John Pugsley

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Add a warm glow to your home or office with the Himalayan Glow Tree Salt Night Light. Easily plugged into any standard outlet. Arrived as advertised Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: really nice, but doesn't swivel
customer_reviews.text: love the look, love the p.h.s rocks.......but the mount doesn't swivel so the outlet can't be horizontal. And newer outlets are often upside down so the larger tine is in the wrong spot.
customer_reviews.author: TravelsWithBooks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome night light
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Comes with just enough salt to fill night light. Salt is a lighter shade of pink than a lamp. Gives a nice ambiance. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the measurements. All of the pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to the measurements. All of the pictures the seller uses make the light appear much bigger than it really is. It’s cute, but it’s very small.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Makes a beautiful addition to our bedroom, adding a soft glow that is great for overnight or when we want to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Sarah Fondren

customer_reviews.title: Love it, ordered more
customer_reviews.text: Love these salt lamps. I have several around the house. Very nice glow for nighttime, easy to change bulbs and looks pretty, unlike most night lites.
customer_reviews.author: Dagwood Bumpsted

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it but it quit working after only 4 months. And yes, I tried new lightbulbs.
customer_reviews.author: love oil life with Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. 2 years old and still works great.
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of people saying theirs didn’t last long... I bought mine 2 years ago and it’s working just fine. I love it so much I’m here to buy a second one for another room.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Calmness and cute
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this. I use it in my office and it hurts enough light and also pretty brings a calm to the room
customer_reviews.author: Mg

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size & brightness of this nightlight. Mine are white instead of the darker hue which was disappointing. I know that Himalayan salt can be different shades so no fault of the seller
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I love this little night light! It's exactly a pictured on the website. It was very easy to place the rocks without damaging the bulb and so far it's working great.
customer_reviews.author: D Allen

customer_reviews.title: Loved it while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I loved the subtle glow of this in my kitchen. I kept it plugged in most of the time, and it lasted about 6 months before it pooped out. I didn't pay much for it, so I'm not too disappointed; although I miss having its glow in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty glow!
customer_reviews.text: Add a very pretty glow to the room. I keep it on all the time, and after months of use, the bulb has not burned out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely soft pinkish glow from this night light.
customer_reviews.text: The Himalayan Salt Night Light is a really good product. I bought 2 of them and they are in use every night. I would certainly buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the person that has everything
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a secret Santa gift for someone and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice nightlight
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for someone who loves Himalayan salt things. The light plug is well made, and the ability to turn the plug is great as it gives more options for where it an be used if space around the outlet is tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D.

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a year ago to help light up my hallway and give a nice vive with it. And I've had to replace the light bulb one time but I am able to see perfectly down my hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Neu

customer_reviews.title: Cute light dirty rocks
customer_reviews.text: The pink rocks are dirty looking, almost black in a lot of spots
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give away for a gift but I kept it. Makes a wonderful night light for my kitchen and so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little light.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little light. I use it in my bathroom for a night light. Perfect and looks terrific. Very happy. I leave it on all the time.
customer_reviews.author: pegasusaj

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My wife and I use it in our master bath as the only light for our morning shower together. Very therapeutic 😉
customer_reviews.author: Levi Michael Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: look nice, feels nice, like the whole idea of it...gets lightly warm.
customer_reviews.author: Annastasia Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 already. Great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect night light
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this. Perfect nightlight for guest bathrooms with the added benefit of the Himalayan salt.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: So cute and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love this little nightlight! Provides just enough light but is also so cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s very bright and warm! The construction seems solid and is very sleek. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great size and brightness for any small room.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Wonderful night light. I love it! Love the salt crystals! Helps keep air clean.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful and unusual nightlight
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Really beautiful and unusual nightlight, add great ambiance to the room and I get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!  love them
customer_reviews.text: SO CUTE!! I bought 2 of these and I absolutely loved them so I bought 2 more !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth A

customer_reviews.title: looks beautiful, leave on 24 / 7
customer_reviews.text: just as described, looks beautiful, leave on 24 / 7, have in two different rooms!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Que Vinski

customer_reviews.title: Defective / Burnt Lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the package. Not sure if unit is defective or lightbulb is burnt out.
customer_reviews.author: sweppos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these night lights! I now have 4 and love them through out my home; great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Puts of a lot of subtle light
customer_reviews.text: I have many of these throughout my main living space and it lights the room(s) very nicely. Low lighting. I don't even need to turn on the hard overhead lights or table lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Iserman

customer_reviews.title: Buy a couple!  Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: Great accent, especially in a foyer or entryway. Sets the mood.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Masi

customer_reviews.title: Night light
customer_reviews.text: This light is unique and gives off a beautiful glow. Perfect for gift giving or to use a night light in the room.
customer_reviews.author: maureen d. brod

customer_reviews.title: They are nice but don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 and they all went out. They are nice but don’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive night light. Has a nice warm glow. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Darling D.

customer_reviews.title: So classy and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Just loved the look and ambience this provided to my bathroom. Looks like a super expensive piece
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love the Himalayan salt lamps. This was no disappointment! Received many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: MommaCoon

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Love this night light! Get alot of compliments. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this night light. Just the right amount of light. great product for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great and is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: works great and is very sturdy. I like that I can remove it from the socket and it will stand on its own and not tip over.
customer_reviews.author: ohjulieanna

customer_reviews.title: Himalayan Glow 1804
customer_reviews.text: The plug is upside down. It does work in my outlet because the 3 prong is up side down. I would like for you to exchange the plug because it is upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked mine so much I ordered some for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: K. F.

customer_reviews.title: Plain white rocks
customer_reviews.text: Item not the same as picture with a nice orange glow. 4 orange rocks the rest white. Looks bland. Nice size but di not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Patrcia A. Layne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our entry hall. One of the prettiest night lights I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: SJP

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous! The night lights come with too many salt ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! The night lights come with too many salt chunks though and I could not pack them all inside.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Tode

customer_reviews.title: Nice night light
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected. Haven't used it yet but appears to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aprile Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great night lights
customer_reviews.text: These are great night lights and make great inexpensive gifts. They clean the air to from the heating salt rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Ardy 7 Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: It is just the right size and the glow is perfect. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Berroteran

product_meta.title: Himalayan Glow 1804 Natural Salt lamp, Framed Night light, Wall Plug in, 360 Rotatable by WBM
product_meta.description: Color:Framed Night LightThe Himalayan salt lamps can release negative ions into the air, creating an effect similar to an ionizer, purifying the surrounding air. This process is enhanced by the natural process of nacl resulting in the production of negative ions which eliminate the positive ions which are present in our environment, produced by computers, refrigerators, televisions and more. Thus, these lamps make the air clean, fresh and healthy to live in.
feature_bullets: Himalayan Glow Natural Salt Lamp Night Light is a Unique Metal Basket Frame is Made From Beautiful Black metal and Filled with 100% Pure Himalayan Rock Salt Crystals.

WBM Salt Lamp has an in-built 360 Degree Rotatable Base to Fit any Types of the Plug with Manual On/Off switch and Has a Detachable Base to Easily Replace the Bulb.Illuminate Your Room with a Warm, Pleasant & Relaxing Amber Glow.
A Good Choice For Gift on Any Holiday, Valentine’s Day, Birthdays, Graduations, and all other Special Occasions, Suitable for Home Decoration and Best Gifts for Family Members and Friends.
Note -Salt lamp May Dissolve Slightly If it's Not Used For a Long Time or Under Humid Environment. Please Wipe it With a Dry Cloth and light It Up.
Customer Satisfaction: We Always Stand Behind Our Products and We Listen to Our Customers.If For Any Reason You Feel Our Pink Salt Night Light Is Not For You,We Offer a 30-Day Money Back Guarantee.

specifications.Included Components: Night light, Himalayan Pink Salt chunks, 7 Watt bulb
specifications.Warranty Description: Wbm llc. Warrants its products to be free of defects in material and workmanship for 30 days from the shipment date unless otherwise noted. Wbm llc. Will replace any item returned to us within the parameters of this policy and found to be defective. All returned warranty-issue merchandise must be properly packed for a safe return shipment and in original purchase condition with the original packaging, the original receipt/invoice/packing slip and an explanation of the item's problem. Wbm llc. Will not refund, credit or cover shipping expenses for warranty item returns or warranty item replacements under any circumstances. Wbm llc. Is not liable for misuse of its products. This warranty does not cover damage due to abuse, neglect, alteration, failure to follow instructions, shipping damage or damaged packaging. Wbm llc. Expressly disclaims all express warranties not stated herein and all implied warranties, including the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.
